item.title: DNS panic attacks in Kubernetes (EKS)
item.description: After moving an application from an EC2 fleet to a Kubernetes cluster hosted on AWS EKS, we started to face some errors due to DNS resolution. The errors where more during intensive usage of the app (bellow an example of the errors we were facing). PDOException: Noticed exception 'PDOException' with message 'SQLSTATE[HY000] [2002] php_network_getaddresses: getaddrinfo failed: Temporary failure in name resolution' We started by checking the overall health of the cluster.
